skill.name: scikit-learn

Use when working with supervised learning (classification, regression), unsupervised learning (clustering, dimensionality reduction), model evaluation, hyperparameter tuning, preprocessing, or building ML pipelines. Provides comprehensive reference documentation for algorithms, preprocessing techniques, pipelines, and best practices.

security_audit.summary: No credential access, environment harvesting, or network exfiltration patterns found. Scripts focus on local ML workflows and optional plot saving only.

content.user_title: Build scikit-learn models with proven workflows
content.value_statement: You need reliable classical ML workflows but the steps are complex. This skill provides ready scikit-learn pipelines, tuning, and evaluation guidance.
actual_capabilities: Build mixed type preprocessing with ColumnTransformer and pipelines
Compare classifiers with cross validation and GridSearchCV
Run clustering analysis with K-Means, DBSCAN, Agglomerative, and Gaussian Mixture
Compute classification and clustering metrics for evaluation
Generate PCA based clustering visualizations and save plots
limitations: Does not train deep learning models
Requires a local Python environment with scikit-learn installed
Examples use built in datasets unless you supply data
No automated data collection or web access

use_cases.title: Validate a classification model
use_cases.description: Build a baseline classifier with proper preprocessing, cross validation, and test metrics.

use_cases.title: Design a production pipeline
use_cases.description: Create a mixed feature pipeline with imputation, encoding, and model tuning.

use_cases.title: Explore clustering structure
use_cases.description: Compare clustering algorithms and pick an optimal cluster count for analysis.

prompt_templates.title: Train a baseline model
prompt_templates.scenario: You have tabular data and labels
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a simple classification pipeline with train test split, scaling, and accuracy, precision, recall, and F1 metrics.

prompt_templates.title: Tune with grid search
prompt_templates.prompt: Set up GridSearchCV for a Random Forest classifier with a reasonable parameter grid and report the best parameters and CV score.

prompt_templates.title: Mixed feature pipeline
prompt_templates.scenario: You have numeric and categorical columns
prompt_templates.prompt: Build a ColumnTransformer pipeline with imputation, scaling, one hot encoding, and a Gradient Boosting classifier.

prompt_templates.title: Advanced clustering review
prompt_templates.prompt: Compare K-Means, DBSCAN, and Agglomerative clustering on my data and recommend the best approach with silhouette and Davies Bouldin scores.

output_examples.input: Evaluate two classifiers on my dataset and recommend one.
output: Cross validation accuracy for each model
Best hyperparameters found for the top model
Test set metrics summary for the selected model

best_practices: Use pipelines to prevent data leakage
anti_patterns: Fit scalers on the full dataset before splitting
Choose metrics without considering class imbalance
Skip cross validation and rely on one split

faq.question: Is this compatible with the latest scikit-learn?
faq.answer: Yes, examples follow stable scikit-learn APIs, but you should verify version differences in your environment.

faq.question: What are the main limits of this skill?
faq.answer: It focuses on classical ML and does not cover deep learning or automated data collection.

faq.question: Can I integrate this with my existing pipelines?
faq.answer: Yes, it uses standard Pipeline and ColumnTransformer patterns that plug into most workflows.

faq.question: Does it access my data or credentials?
faq.answer: No, it does not read sensitive files or call external services.

faq.question: What should I do if a model does not converge?
faq.answer: Increase max_iter, scale features, and review regularization settings.

faq.question: How does it compare to auto ML tools?
faq.answer: It gives transparent, manual control instead of automated search and black box optimization.
